name: Crazy Jacks Corner
description:
This version no more FREE after great success we decided to apply small amount on fee to it. crazy jacks corners - the MULTI-PLAYER game with Facebook integration. Invite other players or user to one on one mode mode and play against the computer even without a network.

select cards from your hand and placing them on the game board, your objective is to create lines of five of the same color on the board.

Your opponent will be battling you for game board,both try to cover the cards or remove each other's cards. Powerful WILD JACKS come into play at the most opportune times and save the day for you (or your opponent!).

You are play with multiplayer(2,3,4) online.

where you can play with your fb friends and can create private tables.

we are launching this early version to get your feedback so we can fix all the issue in next version.

Download Now!
